fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Childe isn't assumed to vape his burst for this weapon and artifact ranking, making 2 NO worse, EM from 2WT becomes less useful stat for both teams.
Freeze Childe:
4BS will be better than all sets mentioned above, and CR Weapons such as VH, Harp will be worse because it's hard to not overcap crit with it, but Polar star remains BiS along with Thundering pulse assuming no use of Bennett, or TTDS.
